ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
You look like you’re doing well today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I’ve been looking forward to seeing you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Umm... If you like, you can have this...
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I hope it helps you out somehow...
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Please don’t hesitate to use it. That’s what items
are for!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I’ve got something for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Here!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
It’s a symbol of my gratitude to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Thanks for always
being there for me!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
And...I hope you’ll still be there for me in the
future as well!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Would you like
to chat a bit?
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Yes! There’s something I wanted to talk to you
about, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
For...me? Thank you so much! I’ll take really good
care of it!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Wha—?! Are you sure I can really have this?!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
You’re really expecting a lot of me... I’ll repay
you by getting stronger!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2402_01_10: Oh, look how late it’s gotten... Time sure flew by.
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2401_01_10: That was really fun! Thanks for chatting with me!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Let’s talk lots again whenever you’ve got time!
That’s a promise, OK?!
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
I learn so much from the stories I hear from the
other Trainers around here.
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8001_0701_02_10: Oh, but it’s not just about the knowledge I gain...
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
I’m really hoping I can make friends with a lot of
different people.
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
It’s so frustrating when my health gets bad and all
I can do is rest...
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But that pain and frustration make me so much
more grateful for the times when I’m healthy and
able to live a normal life.
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8002_0701_03_10: Being healthy really is a wonderful thing.
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I think it’s pretty difficult to tell other people how
I’m feeling.
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I can’t help wondering what the other person will
think, or if it’ll make them hate me or something...
ch0128_00_mitsuru_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
I wish we humans could understand each other’s
feelings the way Ralts can.
